Data Structures

struct  AlignInfo

Detailed Description

Allows to layout components in a horizontal or vertical flow. For each embedded component a layout information can be added. The layout information specifies whether the component should be aligned at the start, middle or end of the available area.

If the flow layout uses a horizontal flow, 'Start' is interpreted as 'Left' and 'End' means 'Right'. If the flow layout uses a vertical flow, 'Start' is interpreted as 'Top' and 'End' means 'Bottom'.
